english.segment1: I give You praise for You deserve it. I give You praise for what You've done. I give You praise for You are able. I give You praise 'til I overcome
english.segment2: I give You praise when the sun is shining.
english.segment3: I give You praise in the dark of night. I give You praise when the battle rages. I give You praise 'til it works out right
english.segment4: The shout of the King is among us. God lives here in our praises. The shout of the King is among us. Praise Him praise Him. Praise Him in everything
english.segment5: Heaven opens as we sing Your praise. Angels join us as we praise Your name
